comments.body: Let's use $ExpectType for new tests. expectType<> is a thing of the past :)

I tried to change this. When doing this:

```
// $ExpectType IControl
new mapboxgl.Control();
```

The tests fail with:
```
ERROR: 670:1  expect  TypeScript@4.1 expected type to be:
  IControl
got:
  Control
```

And that's weird because I just made Control implement IControl. Any pointers on how to fix this?
Ignore previous comment, using this https://github.com/SamVerschueren/tsd#assertions I figured out the proper way to do this is to use `// $ExpectAssignable IControl`
This fails when as IControl is removed now.
